page.title: 06LUBENHAMS CHURCH IN 1985
page.content: Lubenhams church is an old church but it has no ghosts.Up in the bell tower there are five bells which are all in tune.At Lubenhams church the oldest grave is about 250 years old. Rev King has been working there and holding services for about one and a half years.There are two services a week on Sunday and on Tuesday.Sunday services are at 10.00 and on Tuesday it is in the evening.At the church there is a Sunday school and 30 children attend it,it is on Sunday morning at a quarter to ten til eleven. We asked the Vicar if he thought the church would continue to be popular in the future with the community in Lubenham his answer was"I hope that the church will go on with these popular services in the future.
